title: Fist of Fury (1972) DvDRiP Remastered AC3-ENG_Subs-PsiKnife
description:
Fist of Fury (1972) DvDRiP Remastered AC3-ENGSubs-PsiKnife


This is re-encode of the 7.5 Gig DVD+DL NTSC Rip of Fist of Fury by TEAM APEX, from their 45 gig release 'Bruce Lee ultimate Fully Remastered DVD Collection'.

It should be mentioned for Fist of Fury, the subs work fine, but for some reason the original DVD subs didn't include the opening narrative Chinese dialogue for the first minute or so. They will kick in when the spoken lines start, no worries.

You'll need DivX codec installed to watch this on your computer, or a DivX compatible DVD Player if you watch it on a standalone. You'll also need AC3/DirectShow Audio codec installed on your computer.

*Thanks to mistertpitydafoo for his tips and suggestions on encoding quality DivX media*

~PsiKnife_KFT
